message.body: Are you alright
Yes go away
K
We need the $500 (laptop purchase) from you urgently tomorrow first thing in the morning. Could you please leave your ATM card with the PIN number on the red chest tonight. Thanks
Soraya
Good morning everyone. Does anyone have any idea about Soraya's whereabouts. She went to Max's last night and hasn't resurfaced yet. I also don't have Max's contact info.
I'm totally fine you don't have to text everyone in the entire planet
Thanks Rachael. Is anyone there other than her? I need to get in touch with her within the next hour.
I found her.
I need your ATM card by ten.
IT'S NOT EVEN WITH ME. SERIOUSLY YOU WANT TO STRIP ME OF MORE THINGS?? TAKE IT ALL AND GO AWAY
Unfortunately the answer is yes. Where is the card and password by phone please
In my bag I don't know what the password is
Check the big computer it's written in my Internet accounts info file p
Now go away
Ok I will go away.
What time is dr hunt?
I need the pin no NOW
Actually forget about it for now the bank is closing
I will leave your train tickets on the red chest. Tell dr hunt we will pay double next time.
I am also leaving infinite jest
I forgot to return your ATM to your wallet. If you need cash take from daddy. He is home today till 4;20
Just touching base. How is everything?
Hellowwww
Where are you sorsory ?(with a happy whimsical childish tone)

That has happened to me several times. What you do is tell the conductor of the next train what. Happened and you don't have to pay to get back. It just takes longer to get home. But you have to take the train against the direction in which you came.
My professor is saying that that happened to him too
Do you think you can go to giant/ former genaurdies on Baltimore pike and buy us some fruits? Like now? Daddy says it is ok for you to drive there.
Do you have the car?
When are you bringing me the letters
Can I invite a few friends to the 'concert' on Saturday?
Yes
Can you make cupcakes for Saturday
I just realized we can't use the oven.
Daddy is going to come home to pick up some of his stuff tomorrow (today ) morning while Maman and I are in longwood. We will be back around noon or a little later.
Please leave the car keys on the hook...
I NEED NEW CONTACTS I'm on my last pair!!!!
Do you have enough food everyday?
Hellowwww
Llllolllooowww
I'm fine no worries
Do have shelter?
Do you have shelter?
Answer please
Does your father love you?
What? I'm fine I'm at Kalev's
I am assuming the answer to the third question is yes. Is it ???
I'm yes? What??
Stop
Well I know that I love you too. So stop b----ing about life.
WHAT THE HELL?? That doesn't change anything for me??? You're horrible
OK. You have a horrible mom. Maybe that is a problem and you have the right to complain. But the 3 out of four is not so bad. Is it?

We need to know if the mini concert is still going on on Saturday so that we can organize ourselves here. And if yes please could you give me an approximate time??thanks. Your horrible disgusting mom.
Are you interested in making cupcakes for Saturday?
It's going to be Sunday actually
And maybe?
Yes
Maybe about what? Yes about what?
The cupcakes
Lets talk about details tomorrow
Could you turn off all the lights down stairs when you get home. Thanks
The psychiatrist is out of pocket. You have to pay 300 for the consultation. Should we not do it?
I am coming down to talk about it.

I am very frustrated because I invited dad to the silvertones thing and he refuses to come because he says you don't want see him and all I want to do is have my parents support me and instead I'm having to baby you both and be the parent
First where is the ice cream ?and chocolate bar
It must be all melted by now
I forgot to bring it. Can you please address what I sent you
I will where is the ice cream
In the car
Where is the car
With me at Kalev's
Could you go put them in the freezer now and bring them home on the way to pick up Kofi ?
Can you PLEASE ADDRESS THE PROBLEM
But the ice cream is melting. I can't think when the ice cream is melting . I just can't
YOU'RE SO SELFISH
That's how my mind works I can't do anything about it
What's happening
Ok while you are putting the stuff in the freezer. I never said I don't want to see daddy. I said I don't want to be alone with him or have to talk to him on the phone. He is welc
He is welcomed to come here if I know about it in advance and if others are around. I understand that you want him at the wonderful event. I am happy that you feel that way.
Can you call them when you get home I called and the line was busy but I left a message but we should call again
K
If you're not coming home tonight could you please bring back the car by 9:30 tomorrow morning.
Also could you text me when you decide if you're sleeping there or here.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY
Thanks. Love you
Sleeping there
I'm sooooo sleepy can j bring it later than 9:30?
Thanks
Are you up?
Yes

Maman and I are running errands and clothes shopping. Could you do the following in preparation for the concert :
1- vacuum all down stairs 2- wake up the boys. Tell them it is urgent 3- ask them to do the following Kofi Clean half stove Take the garbage out Take the compost out Empty half dishwasher
Shenandoah Clean half stove Take recycling out Clean top of black trash can Empty half the dishwasher
Could you pl turn off all the lights down stairs when you get in? Thanks
K
K
What happened with the Hiking
I have to call them sometime mid day today
How is everything ? Touching base
Fine

Were you able to have a phone session with dr hunt? I called the adventure place and they said that the course was full. They also said scholarships are typically 10% -30% off only. I asked if they recommended another organization...the guy suggested googling: youth wilderness, adventure, development, expedition etc...
Where are you going to sleep tonight
Hellowwwwe
At home
I like your new greeting much more.
Yay!
Which bed at home? I want to sleep in Kofi's room for couple of nights and I didn't want you to be alone on the third floor.
My room
Love you.

I am going to go to penn tomorrow morning 11 ish, and won't be back before 9:30pm. Could you 'manage' your brothers again tomorrow afternoon before you leave for your appointment. And by that I mean to make sure they have food. Do you still have some money left from today? It is not going to be like this everyday. It is just that today I had to take Maman to the airport and tomorrow I have therapy and class.
Do you think you can get up like one ish to kind of look after your brothers.
K
And you could also come straight home from therapy and stay home until I get back?
You didn't say if there was any money left over
Uggggggh I don't know
What about the question before that?
I don't know
Yes
Great. Let's stay in touch tomorrow.

One last thing. The banging of the bathroom door on the second floor is waking me up and jangling my nerves at night. I talked to doda about it. Could you please pay special attention to that yourself too? Thanks. I won't bother any more....
Last last thing!! Please pick up the dirty dishes from my bedroom when you get home. Thanks
Remember the pretzels. No hanky panky. OK?
What????
Just teasing you
I DON'T HAVE A CHECK FOR HER SHOOT

No problem at all. She will understand. She knows we are in transition as a family and that there is a lot of confusion about many things including material things ( not only emotional ). Don't worry at all.
We will write her a check on Thursday. She probably doesn't care and cashing one check instead of two is easier especially if they are only two days apart. Love you. Don't worry.OK!?
Are you anywhere close to the penn library?
No
I am there now. I will leave it to go to class at 5:25.
I want to give you a hug.
Can you bring me a check?
Pass by if you can or want to on your way back home.
The check book is at home.
I said don't worry about it at all. Most health practitioners get paid gazillion years after their services are done.
the check is not important in this context as long as we pay her soon.
You have exceeded your 3G and we are being charged for it. Please try not to use it for a while until the next months cycle rolls in. K?
How is everything honey bunny?
Fine
Sorsory come down for a bit. I want to see you.
Hellowwwww
Why
Where are you
Nooooo
I'm not home
At vidya's
When?
Can you pick me up?
20 minutes
Remind me of her address
I want to eat first. How about in 30.
I thought Vidya lives on Swarthmore!!!!!!
Yeah never mind I'm getting a ride
Do you think you can leave in a few minutes
Give me a bit
How long?
Remember pork chops.
Where are you
Hellowwww
At Hannah's
Great. Are you sleeping at home ?
Probably
love love love love love love love love love love love love lovvvvvvvvve
Is there any way you can pick me up from Philly? Because otherwise ill be stuck there until 9:30 there are no trains
What do you mean there are no trains ???

Stay on the campus honey. Or go the Perlman center (at the hospital ). I can call the campus police ( the men and women who circle around on bikes) to accompany you. Students do that all the time. It is very usual to ask for that. They can accompany you from somewhere on the campus to the station. Do you want that??
Hellowwwww
Can I go to Maryland with auntie tomorrow?
Sure.
What about those truffles?? Hellowwwww Where are the truffles? Are they still there? Did Hanna eat them? I want chocolate.
WHERE ARE THE TRUFFLES????
ABSOLUTELY BEST TRUFFLE I 'VE HAD IN MY LIIIIIIIIIFE!!! You are a genius. That's it I am convinced. I am dying from happiness. AAAAAAAA!!!!
Good!
MOM I TOLD YOU TO NEVER POST STUFF ON MY FACEBOOK IM GOING TO UNFRIEND YOU SOON
I completely forgot. Please don't. I promise. I won't even like anything that is yours anymore.
